item.title: Guilty Gear Strive Nintendo Switch Edition Releases This Week, Preorders Available Now
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/guilty-gear-strive-nintendo-switch-edition-releases-this-week-preorders-available-now/1100-6528916/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Guilty Gear Strive has been on the market for nearly four years, first launching for PS4, PS5, and PC in 2021. Fast forward to 2025, and the fighting game is finally receiving a Nintendo Switch port in just a few days on January 23, and preorders for Guilty Gear Strive: Nintendo Switch Edition are available now.

Guilty Gear Strive Preorder Bonus

There are currently no universal preorder bonuses for Guilty Gear Strive. However, preordering from the official ARC Shop will get you a free mystery gift pack. This includes $30 worth of Guilty Gear Strive merchandise--though it’s only available while supplies last.

Guilty Gear Strive: Nintendo Switch Edition

$60 | Releases January 23

This is the only version of Guilty Gear Strive available for Switch--there’s no deluxe edition or collector’s edition up for grabs. However, along with the base game, this version does include all Season Pass content up to Season 3 right out of the box, giving you plenty of cool extras to explore. The game has been optimized for Switch, featuring a smooth 60fps frame rate and high-quality graphics. Preorders are available at Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, Target, and the official ARC Shop.

Guilty Gear Strive is the seventh mainline game in the Guilty Gear series. Developed by the same folks responsible for Dragon Ball FighterZ, it offers gorgeous 2D graphics, a complex combat system, and a roster of unique characters with their own playstyle. Our review gave it a solid 8 out of 10, thanks to stylish graphics, a complex combat system, and a fun “mission mode” that helps you learn the basics. The PS5, Xbox, and PC versions are currently on Season 4 of DLC content, but the Nintendo Switch edition will launch with just the first three seasons, and will get the Season 4 update later.

Guilty Gear Strive 25th Anniversary Edition (PS5)

$110

While the Switch version is looking like a solid way to hop in on the popular fighting game, PS5 players who want some awesome Guilty Gear collectibles should check out the Guilty Gear Strive 25th Anniversary Edition. The Anniversary Edition launched back in March 2024, but happens to still be available for $110 at Amazon. This PS5-exclsusive version of the game is packed with collectibles, including:

  • Guilty Gear Strive: Daredevil Edition (PS5 version)
  • Guilty Gear Strive Season 1 pass ($15 value)
  • Guilty Gear Strive Season 2 pass ($25 value)
  • Guilty Gear Strive Season 3 pass ($25 value)
  • Guilty Gear Strive Artworks Archive
  • Original soundtrack on CD
  • Limited-edition steelbook case
  • Collector's box

While we've seen the Guilty Gear Strive 25th Anniversary Edition go on sale as low as $65, it's still worth picking up at full price since we don't know how long stocks will last.
